data.text: @RepDavidValadao @TSA Russians dropped a bomb on a maternity and children's hospital in Mariupol #ukraine, and this is not the first crime against humanity. They killed more than 71!!!!!! children. Please close the sky or give us fighter jets, anti-rocket, anti-aircraft defece #CloseTheSky #StopRussia

@RepDavidValadao @TSA @RepDavidValadao Yesterday Russian militaries have bombed children & maternity hospitals in Ukraine while you are thinking about planes for Ukraine and closing the sky over Ukraine. What else should happen to urge you to take a strong position and not be afraid? #stopWarInUkraine https://t.co/0uw4VyYoNn
@RepDavidValadao @TSA David hoping and praying here that engaging in some dumb culture war BS like masks and gas prices makes the MAGAs forget he voted to impeach their God.

@RepDavidValadao @TSA Dear Mr. Valadao, you probably already know about the bombing of a maternity hospital in Ukraine by Russian troops. https://t.co/Apzg84Mgap If you don't show determination, the whole world will see it. Close the sky over Ukraine in any way! https://t.co/wIJ6M3qQjj
@RepDavidValadao @TSA Nothing wrong with wearing a mask in a plane â€¦

@RepDavidValadao @TSA Yesterday the Russians dropped a bomb on a maternity and children's hospital in Mariupol #ukraine, and this is not the first crime against humanity. They killed 71!!!!! children. Please close the sky or give us fighter jets, anti-rocket, anti-aircraft defence #CloseTheSky
